paragraphs.body: The White Lotus Sentinel was an easy way to discover the fanon portal's newest, and oldest, Avatar fan fiction series. From 2012 to 2015, the newsletter was a unique form of fanon news and updates, compiling the latest chapter releases into a small newsletter delivered to your message wall every fortnight. It has now been merged with Avatar Wiki's main newsletter, ${link_0}. Columns included:
paragraphs.text: The White Lotus Sentinel was an easy way to discover the fanon portal's newest, and oldest, Avatar fan fiction series. From 2012 to 2015, the newsletter was a unique form of fanon news and updates, compiling the latest chapter releases into a small newsletter delivered to your message wall every fortnight. It has now been merged with Avatar Wiki's main newsletter, The Ba Sing Se Times. Columns included:
